text:
Each Matsu seems to have their own opinion of the slop, some preferring the harsh training regimen over being force fed so much food at once. But any and all protests are muffled by the feeding tubes and how addictive the ingredients are - making each brother crave the taste as they guzzled down the contents. If their cocks weren’t restrained by the bitchsuits it was likely that one of them would have cum by this point.

As it stands, each Matsu is filled to the brim with slop. They slurp at the tubes and put all their focus on eating their fill. 

They don’t even pay attention to the fact that their stomachs are already beginning to be a little rounder.

It takes a while for the slop to be finished off, the brigade watching eagerly as their slaves are forced to swallow it down. They notice that their stomachs have gotten bigger, and when the tubes are taken out of their mouths, that's the next area of focus.

"Such plump little piggies!" One of them chuckles as he squeezes Ichi's stomach. "Just think of how tight the latex will be by the time you've reached your full potential."

He gives him a kiss to his open mouth, leaning him on his legs in a sitting position while squeezing his stomach.

"We'll give you your next meal in a few hours. In the meantime, let's start gearing you up for your new look."

Looking through the drawer, he pulls out a set of floppy rubber pig ear headbands, pig tail buttplugs, and another set of nose hooks. The new nose hooks are an add-on, stretching out and showing off their nostrils even more by looping around the back of their heads horizontally, rather than the vertical hooks already on their faces.

The new makeover starts, each Matsu forced to endure their new getups.

Each Matsu groans when the tubes are taken away. They’re extremely full but they can’t help but feel disappointed - if only because of the addictive ingredients. They’re already chubbier, but there’s apparently plans to keep feeding them until their straining against their bitchsuits.

Ichi grunts when he’s sat up, drooling a little hungrily. He can’t even bring himself to wiggle and squirm when the headband is put on or when the extra hooks are applied. 

Only Jyushi still seems to have some resistance in him. If it could be called that. It really just seemed to be excess energy and excitement that kept him on the move. He really liked what they were being fed.

As the Brigade gears up Jyushi's new look as a rubber pig slut, they find themselves growing irritated as he wiggles and squirms. Once they've applied the hook add-ons, one member gives him a firm slap to the face.

"You want more, you damn slut?" He taunts, squishing his cheeks after the slap. "You're such a greedy little pig... we'll be sure to give you an extra large serving for your breakfast."

The men lube up the pig tail butt plugs, shoving them inside the Matsus' asses. With each Matsu in their new getups, one Brigade member stands in front of them, ready to give instructions.

"It's bedtime for you pigs, so I don't want to hear a single squeal out of you. Understand?"

Jyushi squeals, very much in character for his new role as a piggy, when he’s slapped. His face looks absolutely ridiculous with the extra pair of hooks, tongue sticking out and slobbering hungrily. He even wiggles his ass in anticipation for being promised an extra large serving for breakfast. How lucky for him!

But his brothers don’t seem to share his enthusiasm as they groan and whine, jolting forward when the tail plugs are shoved into their asses to fill their holes. 

Scared out of their wits however, each Matsu gives the speaking man their rapt attention, nodding hastily in agreement. Not a sound if it meant they wouldn’t get punished.

The brigade snickers at the Matsus' fearful expressions, looking even more ridiculous than ever with the extra pair of nose hooks deforming their faces.

"That's it, be good piggies for us," the same member says as his friends bring out three cages each. The cages aren't very spacious, and from the looks of it, the Matsus would barely fit. Even more so when they'd be fattened up further tomorrow.

They shove the Matsus inside their cages, one of the members pulling out his phone and recording their faces all in a row.

"These pathetic piggies are ready to serve all you convention go-ers," he says, zooming in and focusing on their tongues and noses. "We're training them to make sure they fit the role well."

After uploading the video, the brigade shuts off the lights, leaving the Matsus to contemplate in the dark.

With only three cages, each Matsu would have to share the limited space with another. And even with only two to a cage, some of the brothers were only imagining how uncomfortable the fit was going to be. The first one in is arguably the lucky one in terms of getting in, but in the long run they end up getting squished the most.

It takes a little bit of time, but eventually they’re all inside - squeezed up against one another and faces pressed against and distorted by the bars.

They still don’t make any noise, too afraid of being punished while the video is being taken to do anything but pant heavily until the phone is turned off.

The night passes by comfortably for the Brigade, each of them sleeping in cozy beds while their slaves are confined in tight cages together. The group can't wait to see their transformations, ecstatic to see them grow plumper and more helpless as time went on.

When morning arrives, the men kick the cages to rattle them, signaling to the pigs that they had to wake up.

"It's breakfast time," one chuckles as the six are yanked out of their cages, tubes lodged into their mouths shortly after.

Six identical squeals fill the room when the cages are kicked to wake them up, startling each Matsu into consciousness. It takes a little bit of tugging to pull them out of their cages but eventually it gets done.

Were the convention goers really going to be into this? Only Jyushi seemed to be excited about the meal they were about to be force fed, remembering that he was promised an extra large serving.

The other Matsus are still drooling over the prospect of food, now hooked on the addictive ingredients that were used in the slop. It’d be nearly impossible to shake them of the addiction even if they were to escape.

The addictive slop is distributed into six different tanks, with Jyushi's tank twice as large. With a hum, the machine springs to life, shooting the food through the tubes and into the Matsus' stomachs.

"Enjoying your serving?" A brigade member asks Jyushi as he smacks him on the ass. "You'll be even bigger than your brothers at this rate. Are you really fine with that?"

He gives him another smack before standing up, seeing that the tanks are nearly empty except for Jyushi's. He doesn't object as he watches another member pour more food in, filling it up once again.

"You must be hungry if you can swallow down that much... how fitting for a dumb pig."

Part of the reason the Matsus seems to enjoy meal time so much is because it’s one of the more calm moments in their training so far. They aren’t being slapped around or fucked. All they have to do is eat, and that’s been made easier just because the slop is so addictive they don’t mind putting it down.

Each Matsu is in an almost sitting position as they eat, staring blankly in different directions as the food is pumped into their stomachs - fattening them up and filling out more of their bitchsuits and putting more weight on their tail plugs.

Jyushi’s ass jiggles a little when it’s slapped, the Matsu guzzling down his extra serving with excitement. He even catches when one of the members starts filling it up again to equal two more portions - three more portions than what his brothers had eaten so far.

He’s starting to look bigger than his brothers too, having some trouble shifting onto all fours when sitting no longer becomes comfortable.

The brigade gathers around Jyushi as he guzzles down the slop, poking his cheeks and squeezing his stomach. They give his trapped bulge some attention as well with furious strokes and gropes.

"You look like quite the proper piggy!" One chuckles as he ruffles his hair. "The transformation isn't quite done yet, but you're making nice progress."

The other Matsus are given an extra serving as Jyushi is given two more - a total of four more servings than his brothers. When it's over, the Matsus are forced to endure rough gropes to their bulges from the brigade after the tubes are removed.

"How was your meal?" One asks Jyushi as he leans him on his knees and elbows once more. "Was it tasty?"

Jyushi groans as he’s helped back onto all fours, stomach just barely touching the floor as he’s moved. Still, he did think the food was good! It was worth how tight the bitchsuit was on him.

His brothers definitely aren’t as enthused, releasing the same groans and wiggling away from the tubes as quickly as they can.

"Looks like the other piggies didn't appreciate our generous meal," one of the brigade members says as he squishes Jyushi's now chubby cheeks. "We'll have to teach them a lesson in gratitude."

Ichi's tormentor covers his mouth and plugs his stretched nostrils as he leans in his ear, whispering his threat.

"How about we teach you a little lesson first, piggy? If you can't appreciate being fed, surely you don't appreciate the privelege of air..."

The other Matsus excluding Jyushi are next, each one's air supply cut off by the Brigade.

Jyushi giggles a little bit when his cheeks are squished, drooling as he smiles. Things weren’t so bad once he accepted it and learned to play along. Why couldn’t his brothers figure that out? He has to cringe when he watches them being deprived of air, realizing just how easily it could have been prevented.

Ichi’s eyes widen when he can no longer breathe, squirming uncomfortably and glancing around the room for help only to discover that his brothers are getting the same treatment.

It doesn’t take long before the five Matsus are squealing into the hands of their captors’, fighting for the chance to take at least one breath before they pass out. It’s an uncomfortable and terrifying experience as Totty begins to cry and wail.

Trying to get out of it himself, Kara starts to wiggle his ass and let out a series of muffled oinks to show his gratitude.

The members of the Brigade sneer down at their slaves as they deprive them of air. When Kara starts to oink like a pig through his tormentor's hand, the Brigade laughs at how utterly ridiculous he sounds.

"Such a damn dirty pig," the man in charge of his breath control chuckles. Even as he releases his hold on him, he still has plans for the Matsu as he reaches for a vibrator and presses it against his trapped bulge. The wand vibrates on a high setting as the man leans in his ear, all while Kara's brothers sans Jyushi have their air supply cut off.

"If you want me to stop, squeal about how much you love the food that's fattening you up and how you love being treated like this."

Now only two of the six brothers could breath properly. Struggling as hard as they can it isn’t much longer before they start to wiggle their chubby bodies and squeal, following Kara’s lead when they see that oinking gets him the ability to breath back.

“Ah lahve thes an’ foo! Pweah! Ah lahve, ah lahve!” Kara gargles, unable to find any release with his trapped bulge. And he kind of does...or at least part of him does. He feels unbearably hard as he cries and squeals, humping against the vibrator.

The brigade howls in laughter as Kara's gargled squeals fill the room. The laughter only gets louder once the other sextuplets start to wiggle, their loud oinks drowning out the laughter only by a small margin.

"I knew you'd come around, pig," the man near Kara snickers as he smacks his ass. The other sextuplets' tormentors release their holds on them, allowing them to breathe once more.

"Since you love the food so much, how about I give you some more?" The man near Kara smirks as he stands over him. "You said so yourself. Think of it as a reward."

One of the other brigade members gives him a tube connected to the machine, which he shoves into Kara's mouth. He doesn't even bother to get rid of the vibrator, in fact he presses it harder into his bulge.

"Do the rest of you want to be teased like that? Not that you really have a say in it anyway."

Loud gasps fill the room as the rest of the Matsus catch their breath. Jyushi is the only one not red in the face from being unable to breath, still smiling and drooling dopily as he accustomed himself to their new lives as pigs. The food wasn’t that bad, they had to be craving it just as much as he was after just two days of eating in preparation for the convention - they probably were just freaked out by the way that they were fed.

Kara oinks, tears filling his eyes as he debases himself. Not being able to cum was driving him up the wall with need. He’d do just about anything to feel good, even if it meant playing along and being a good little piggy. He sucks on the tube greedily and swallows his extra helping of mush, still rutting against the vibrator and huffing through his nose.

“Pweah! Wea lahve foo!” Come four different cries as the remainder of the Matsus start to beg for more of the slop they were being fed. Hopefully submitting to being fed again would get them out of suffering the same fate as Kara.

The Brigade is both aroused and amused as the Matsus' slurred speech fills the room. They chuckle lowly as they prepare the feeding tubes for their next meal, shoving the tubes deep into their drooling mouths. The machine spurs to life and pumps even more food into their stomachs, the Brigade surrounding them and pinching their chubby cheeks. The only Matsu to not undergo this treatment is Jyushi, instead receiving squeezes to his now round stomach.

"Have fun swallowing all that slop," one snickers to the rest as he squeezes Jyushi's cheeks. "I can already tell you're all addicted to it like the filthy pigs you are."

It’s true. Despite their relunctance, each Matsu is hooked on the slop they’re being fed - turning into round little piggies that would be a sensation at the convention. Not only are they each now straining against their bitchsuits as the latex squeezes uncomfortably around them, but their new size and shortened limbs makes it extremely difficult for any of them to move very quickly.

Not that they would want to when they’re being fed. 

They hardly even notice being prodded as they slurp down the tubes and quickly get through their latest serving. Kara is the quickest of them all, twitching against the vibrator and squealing when his vat is empty.

With each Matsu slurping down their share of the slop, the Brigade is throughly entertained as their bitchsuits squeeze even tighter to their chubby forms. Once the food is all gone, the Brigade turns off the machine along with Kara's vibrator.

"Did our piggies enjoy their meal?" One chuckles as he squishes Oso's cheeks. "You're all nice and plump now... practically helpless. I can't wait to see how you fare at the convention."

He gives Oso a kiss to the cheek before standing up to observe the pig slaves. Each Matsu is nice and round, fitting their new roles perfectly. The remainder of the training would be focused on sex, along with breaking their wills down into perfect pig sluts.

"How about we test out your movement with another piggy race?"

Salivating after their most recent meal, each of the Matsus oink and pant with their tongues hanging out once the tubes are removed from their mouths. The food was definitely a good idea in breaking down their wills and making it the only thing they can think about. 

They don’t even whine when the member mentions another race, staring at him dumbly and drooling onto the floor as they think about when their next meal will come.

A few of them chuckle as the Matsus stare up at the man, the group positioning them with some difficulty so they're all lined up in a row. They each receive sloppy kisses from members of the Brigade, along with pinches and pats to their chubby cheeks.

"Whoever gets to the other side first gets an extra serving of slop," one explains as the pigs are held in place. "The losers will get their useless bulges teased and tormented. Feel free to do whatever you can to reach the end to get that reward."

"On your mark, get set, go!"

In the last race, the starting signal had caused the two participating Matsus to tumble forward at a fair quick pace. This race is a little different. 

No brother moves for an extremely long period of time as they just drool openly on the floor with blank looks on their faces. Eventually Ichi is on the move, tottering forward with his chubby stomach touching the floor and making it hard to move.

The other Matsus are in the same position with the exception of Jyushi who starts moving but struggles to maintain his balance and ends up tipping onto his side unable to get back up.

Choro is the first to cross the finish line, oinking excitedly but getting a sad expression on his face when he realizes he’ll have to waddle back over to the vats.
